item.title: Allstar 317 need help with a function
item.dc:creator: @Daztech Daztech
item.description:
@Daztech wrote:

hey how can i make the shrimp catching not stop? because at the moment you have to spam click it to get shrimp, i want to make it so that it continues to fish it without spam clicking with the emote

if (NPCID == 235 && playerLevel[10] >= 1) { if (actionTimer == 0) { startAnimation(622); addItem(317, 1); addSkillXP(150 * playerLevel[10], 10); sendMessage("You fish a shrimp"); actionTimer = 5; } else if (!playerHasItem(307)) { sendMessage("You need a fishing rod to catch shrimp."); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Allstar 317 need help with a function
